title: What is the name of person whose murder led to Bhutto’s hanging? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was Muhammed Ahmed Qasuri, father of Ahmed Raza Qasuri, Ahmed raza was founding member or Bhutto's political party in 1967. Lately, some political differences developed, and according to Director General of Federal security Force Masood Mehmud, bhutto planned to kill Ahmed Raza. Assassination of Ahmed Raza was carried out by ambushing his car in Lahore, and mistakenly, instead of Ahmed Raza, his father died as a result of firing.

This is the picture of the funeral of Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto, after he was hanged till death on the charges of murdering Mr Nawab Muhammad Kasuri[1] . He was the father of Ahmed Raza Kasuri once close comrade of Mr Bhutto, and later become fierce rival. Bhutto was hanged on 4 April 1979. Footnotes[1] A leaf from history: Bhutto awarded death sentence
